channel.title: CVE Feed for HYPR -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HYPR -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6336|2024-08-02T08:28:21.310Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on MacOS allows User-Controlled Filename.This issue affects Workforce Access: before 8.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-6334|2024-08-02T08:28:21.813Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on Windows allows Overflow Buffers.This issue affects Workforce Access: before 8.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-6335|2024-08-02T08:28:21.827Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on Windows allows User-Controlled Filename.This issue affects Workforce Access: before 8.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-0834|2024-08-02T05:24:34.582Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on MacOS allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Workforce Access: from 6.12 before 8.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-1477|2024-08-02T05:49:11.647Z -- hypr -- keycloak%20authenticator%20extension
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in HYPR Keycloak Authenticator Extension allows Authentication Abuse.This issue affects HYPR Keycloak Authenticator Extension: before 7.10.2, before 8.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-1837|2024-08-02T06:05:26.699Z -- hypr -- hypr%20server
item.description: Missing Authentication for critical function vulnerability in HYPR Server allows Authentication Bypass when using Legacy APIs.This issue affects HYPR Server: before 8.0 (with enabled Legacy APIs)

item.title: CVE-2023-5097|2024-08-02T07:44:53.892Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on Windows allows Path Traversal.This issue affects Workforce Access: before 8.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-1721|2024-08-01T18:48:21.740Z -- hypr -- passwordless
item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in HYPR Passwordless on Windows allows Malicious Software Update.This issue affects HYPR Passwordless: before 9.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-1721|2024-06-06T13:12:54.314Z -- hypr -- passwordless
item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in HYPR Passwordless on Windows allows Malicious Software Update.This issue affects HYPR Passwordless: before 9.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-0068|2024-02-29T19:51:38.562Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on MacOS allows File Manipulation.This issue affects Workforce Access: before 8.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-0068|2024-08-01T17:41:16.014Z -- hypr -- workforce%20access
item.description: Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability in HYPR Workforce Access on MacOS allows File Manipulation.This issue affects Workforce Access: before 8.7.1.
